scramble.question: 水を飲むことは体に良いです。(is / water / good / drinking / for) your health. [cite: 30, 31]
choices: Drinking water is good for your health.
Is drinking water good for your health.
Good for your health is drinking water.
Water drinking is for your good health.
scramble.answer: Drinking water is good for your health.

scramble.question: 窓を開けましょうか？ (I / open / the / shall / window)? [cite: 30]
あなたのコンピューター使ってもよろしいでしょうか？ (your / may / I / use / computer), please? [cite: 34, 35]
choices: May I use your computer, please?
I may use your computer, please?
Please may I use your computer?
May use I your computer, please?
scramble.answer: May I use your computer, please?

scramble.question: 何か飲みものはいかがでしょうか？ (something / drink / to / like / you / would )? [cite: 34]
choices: Would you like something to drink?
You would like something to drink?
Like you would something to drink?
Would you like to something drink?
scramble.answer: Would you like something to drink?

scramble.question: 病気のため今日は授業を休む予定だ。(class / from / I'll / absent / be) today due to illness. [cite: 38, 39]
choices: I'll be absent from class today due to illness.
